sentences.english: The Oreqen people inhabiting the mountainous areas of the Xing'an Range are often simply called the "Mountain people".
sentences.chinese: 鄂伦春族分布在兴安岭山地，被称为“山岭上人”。

sentences.english: Chapter Seven, think about the inheritance of Oroqen ethnic minority"s traditional plays."

sentences.english: Remote mountain woods is the Elunchun people's bailment of life and sentiment.
sentences.chinese: 深山密林是鄂伦春人生命与情感的寄托。
